text: Paul Price (born ) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Hammond Ciesar All-Americans in one game during the 1940–41 season and scored six points. == References == Category:1910s births Category:Year of birth uncertain Category:Possibly living people Category:American men's basketball players Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Hammond Ciesar All-Americans players
title: Paul Price (basketball)
